caption: A man holds money and speaks to a little girl and a woman in white clothes. And then the man and the woman sit in a car while the girl in red clothing is washing the car outside. Suddenly, the paint on top of the car roof spills, splattering paint all over the vehicle. A group of people gathers outside the house, looking at the car covered in colorful paint. The little girl goes inside and washes her hands at the sink, then starts feeding a baby. The whole family is in the dining room, sitting at the table and chatting.
